p: AmB, amphotericin-B; AP, aqueous phase; GC/MS, gas chromatography-mass spectrometry; DMEM, Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle’s Medium; DMSO, dimethylsulfoxide; EO, essential oil; FLU, fluconazole; ME, microemulsion; ME+EO, loaded essential oil in the microemulsion; OP, oil phase; PBS, phosphate-buffered saline; RPMI, Roswell Park Memorial Institute; S, surfactant SDA, Sabouraud Dextrose Agar; SDB, Sabouraud Dextrose broth; SisGen, National System for the Management of Genetic Heritage and Associated Traditional Knowledge; VVC, vulvovaginal candidiasis.
